snippet: The proposal, centering on a special audit of suspected fraudulent votes, appeared to waver nearly as quickly as it was proposed.
abstract: Sec of State John Kerry heads to Afghanistan to try to mediate between presidential candidates Ashraf Ghani and Abdullah Abdullah after United Nations ballot audit proposal fails.

byline.original: By MATTHEW ROSENBERG and CARLOTTA GALL

lead_paragraph: The proposal, centering on a special audit of suspected fraudulent votes, appeared to waver nearly as quickly as it was proposed.

headline.main: U.N. Proposal Fails to Ease Crisis Over Disputed Afghan Election
headline.print_headline: U.N. Proposal Fails to Ease Crisis Over Disputed Afghan Election
